Blog.post: why all sian sian one?i also very sian ar...but today quite rushing...went out at 12 something to the food expo...only eat a little then have to go...actually have tuition..but i naughty,decide not to go...then went to look for Gap friends....then went to suntec with the...met a few new friends...some of them very 38...jessica also think so..no offence..then after tt went to eat..then we talk lor...till bout 8.15..then went home with jessica and karen...tt is all...actually...tmr there is the NE workshop...then i lazy..dun wan to go...coz min hui also never go...then i muz do housework at home.. cnnot tolerate my brother..whole day play...sigh...hey...remember there is wacky inventors on 3 june,thursday...after tt..u all wan to go out?

cheer upx gals..! we should be enjoying.. it's holidays..! but i guess i hv to talk to my mother long.. 4 mi to go out.. haix.. i think she is not expecting mi to go out tis holiday.. haha.... =(.. 7.34pm

i hope all zathaz are fine..haiz..i noe there are some probs esp. to ms n sarah...i dun wish to say out to sarah again...we r having fun playing together now...so dun let her be sad again..i noe tt the broken heart wont be heal already...n to ms...thanks so much...dun u feel extra..u r not...pls dun feel tt way...we r all equal...u will be fine gals wif all zathaz members(",)... p.s.dun broad over all tis useless things...its not worth it...

Dearest Ms, Im so sorry dat i made u so sad.Its not worth it at all.I have stopped thinking dat i was a flirt but since jx n dat idiot said it..im beginning to think of it myself...To dem guys are my life but in my heart its not but i cant stopped thinking dat i m a flirter...Im sorry

To ZaThaZ L7...Im so sorry to make u all worry n sad.I guess some of u noe wad had happened...I tink this word "flirter" will always be wif me for a long long time...I was always wif guys is cuz i m helping dem out....some have love probx or frenship probx so i m helping dem out.But some of my "good" frens like LEE JUN XIANG went around saying im a flirt...Tis words are so so hurtful as they are from my good fren....i noe some of u dun tink im a flirter but maybe IM a flirter....

to mei sheng...u are not an extra,juz tt u are very caring,let sarah be herself....if she dun wan to cheer up..u can't do anything...so...dun balme urself.. to sarah....i also dunno wad to say....but u should not listen to others and think tt u are a flirt....remember this phrase...he who angers you conquers you...and dun be sad...listen to mei sheng.. to everyone....stay happy....

When you are sad i will dry your tears When you are scared i will ease your fears When you are worried i will give you hope If you want to give up i'll help you cope When you're lost and can't see the light I'll be your beacon shining so bright This is my oath that i pledge to the end Why you may ask?
